about_the_game: Groove to the stellar beats of the Solar Showdown Original Soundtrack, with each song modified by the composer to fit a more traditional listening experience. From meditative to heart-pumping, these nine tracks will let you relive your favorite in-game moments and memories from the BYU Center for Animation's Solar Showdown!

From meditative to heart-pumping, these nine tracks will let you relive your favorite in-game moments and memories from the BYU Center for Animation's Solar Showdown!
